description: Access public song data via the Spotify API

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Add a song to your queue

properties.name: Currently Playing
properties.description: Get your currently playing track

properties.name: Next Song
properties.description: Skip to your next track

properties.name: Pause
properties.description: Pause your music

properties.name: Previous Song
properties.description: Skip to your previous song

properties.name: Recently Played
properties.description: Get your recently played tracks

properties.name: Resume
properties.description: Resume playback on the current active device

properties.name: Set Volume
properties.description: Set volume on the current active device

properties.name: Start Music
properties.description: Start playing a playlist, artist, or album

properties.name: id
properties.description: Enter a playlist, artist, or album URI or ID

properties.name: Get New Releases
properties.description: Get a list of new album releases

properties.name: Get Tracks
properties.description: Get an album's tracks by URI or ID

properties.name: Search
properties.description: Search albums by keyword

properties.name: query
properties.description: The keyword term to search for

properties.name: Get Albums
properties.description: Get an artist's albums by URI or ID

properties.name: Get Related Artists
properties.description: Get an artist's related artists by URI or ID

properties.name: Get Top Tracks
properties.description: Get an artist's top tracks by URI or ID

properties.name: country
properties.description: Top tracks in which country? Enter the postal abbreviation

properties.name: Create a Playlist
properties.description: Create a new playlist

properties.name: Get
properties.description: Get a playlist by URI or ID

properties.name: Get the User's Playlists
properties.description: Get a user's playlists

properties.name: Remove an Item
properties.description: Remove tracks from a playlist by track and playlist URI or ID

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the playlist to create

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Description for the playlist to create

properties.name: public
properties.description: Whether the playlist is publicly accessible

properties.name: trackID
properties.description: The track's Spotify URI or its ID. The track to add/delete from the playlist.

properties.name: Get Audio Features
properties.description: Get audio features for a track by URI or ID

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: volumePercent
properties.description: The volume percentage to set

properties.name: filters
properties.description: Country to filter new releases by
